content: this pattern uses very little yarn to create a cute eggdog 1 meme plush if you use worsted weight yarn you ll end up with an eggdog about 3 inches tall you ll need about 15-20 yards of the main color of your eggdog and 1 or 2 yards of another color for your face embroidery i used a thin black yarn for the face 1 https //www odditycentral com/animals/cute-pomeranian-becomes-internet-sensation-after-being-groomed-to-look-like-an-egg html
